mysql.name: tearDBdel_t_content_picture_byTitle
mysql.sql: delete p.* from t_content_picture p where EXISTS(select 1 from t_resource r where r.title = "%(title)s" and p.resource_id = r.id);

mysql.name: tearDBdel_t_sku_byTitle
mysql.sql: delete s.* from t_sku s where EXISTS(select 1 from t_resource r where r.title = "%(title)s" and s.resource_id = r.id) ;

mysql.name: tearDBdel_t_vendor_rel_byTitle
mysql.sql: delete vl.* from t_vendor_rel vl where EXISTS(select 1 from t_resource r where r.title = "%(title)s" and vl.resource_id = r.id) ;
mysql.desc: 删除活动分类信息数据

mysql.name: tearDBdel_t_tag_rel_byTitle
mysql.sql: delete tl.* from t_tag_rel tl where EXISTS(select 1 from t_resource r where r.title = "%(title)s" and tl.resource_id = r.id) ;
mysql.desc: 删除活动标签信息数据

mysql.name: tearDBdel_t_resource_byTitle
mysql.sql: delete r.* from t_resource r where r.title = "%(title)s" and r.resource_type_id = 12;
